org.activebpel.work.child
Class AeChildWorkItem

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.work.child.AeChildWorkItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable, commonj.work.RemoteWorkItem, commonj.work.WorkItem
public class AeChildWorkItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements commonj.work.RemoteWorkItem

Implements a WorkItem for a AeChildWorkManager. Implements the RemoteWorkItem interface instead of just the WorkItem interface, because a WorkManager must return a RemoteWorkItem when a Serializable Work object is scheduled.

Nested Class Summary
protected  class AeChildWorkItem.AeChildWork
          Extends AeDelegatingWork to notify this child work item when the Work has completed.
